concept.description: Provides Java types as aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(metricsType:Java:Type) WHERE NOT metricsType:Inner WITH metricsType MATCH (metricsType)-[:DECLARES*0..]->(aggregatedType:Java:Type) WHERE NOT aggregatedType:Generated CALL { WITH metricsType, aggregatedType MERGE (metricsType)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics{aggregationLevel:":Java:Type"}) MERGE (nodeMetrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(aggregatedType) RETURN nodeMetrics } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Creates a CodeCharta report for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (root:Java:Package) WHERE NOT (:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(root) WITH root MATCH (type:Java:Type)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(:CodeCharta:Metrics), tree = shortestPath((root)-[:CONTAINS*]->(type)) WHERE // filter non-Type/Package nodes providing CONTAINS-relations (e.g. service loader) all (node in nodes(tree) WHERE node:Java:Type or node:Java:Package) // ignore generated types and not type:Generated WITH nodes(tree) as nodes UNWIND nodes as node OPTIONAL MATCH (parentNode:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(node) OPTIONAL MATCH (node)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) RETURN node as Node, node.name as NodeLabel, parentNode as ParentNode, nodeMetrics as NodeMetrics, [(nodeMetrics)-[edgeMetrics:HAS_EDGE_METRICS]->() | edgeMetrics ] as EdgeMetrics

concept.description: Provides empty node and edge metrics for Maven modules.
concept.cypher: MATCH (project:Maven:Project:Directory) MERGE (project)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics{aggregationLevel:":Maven:Project"}) WITH project, nodeMetrics MATCH (project)-[:CREATES]->(:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Java:Type) WHERE NOT type:Generated MERGE (nodeMetrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type) RETURN count(distinct nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Creates a CodeCharta report for Maven modules.
concept.cypher: MATCH (node:Maven:Project:Directory)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) OPTIONAL MATCH (parentNode:Maven:Project:Directory)-[:HAS_MODULE]->(node) RETURN node AS Node, node.fqn AS NodeLabel, parentNode AS ParentNode, nodeMetrics as NodeMetrics, [(nodeMetrics)-[edgeMetrics:HAS_EDGE_METRICS]->() | edgeMetrics ] as EdgeMetrics

concept.description: Provides numberOfTypes metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type) WITH nodeMetrics, count(type) as numberOfTypes CALL { WITH nodeMetrics, numberOfTypes SET nodeMetrics.numberOfTypes = numberOfTypes } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(nodeMetrics) as NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides rloc and complexity metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Java:Method) WITH nodeMetrics, sum(method.effectiveLineCount) AS rloc, sum(method.cyclomaticComplexity) AS complexity CALL { WITH nodeMetrics, rloc, complexity SET nodeMetrics.rloc = rloc SET nodeMetrics.complexity = complexity } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides fanIn metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type), (dependentNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(dependentType:Type), (dependentType:Type)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(type) WHERE nodeMetrics <> dependentNodeMetrics and nodeMetrics.aggregationLevel = dependentNodeMetrics.aggregationLevel WITH nodeMetrics, count(dependsOn) AS fanIn, sum(dependsOn.weight) as fanInTotal CALL { WITH nodeMetrics, fanIn, fanInTotal SET nodeMetrics.fanIn = fanIn SET nodeMetrics.fanInTotal = fanInTotal } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides fanOut node metrics per aggregation level.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type), (dependencyNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(dependencyType:Type), (type:Type)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependencyType) WHERE nodeMetrics <> dependencyNodeMetrics and nodeMetrics.aggregationLevel = dependencyNodeMetrics.aggregationLevel WITH nodeMetrics, count(dependsOn) AS fanOut, sum(dependsOn.weight) as fanOutTotal CALL { WITH nodeMetrics, fanOut, fanOutTotal SET nodeMetrics.fanOut = fanOut SET nodeMetrics.fanOutTotal = fanOutTotal } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides FanOut node and edge metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (fromNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type), (toNodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(dependencyType:Type), (type)-[dependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependencyType) WHERE fromNodeMetrics <> toNodeMetrics and fromNodeMetrics.aggregationLevel = toNodeMetrics.aggregationLevel WITH fromNodeMetrics, count(dependsOn) as coupling, sum(dependsOn.weight) as couplingTotal, toNodeMetrics CALL { WITH fromNodeMetrics, coupling, couplingTotal, toNodeMetrics MERGE (fromNodeMetrics)-[edgeMetrics:HAS_EDGE_METRICS]->(toNodeMetrics) SET edgeMetrics.coupling = coupling SET edgeMetrics.couplingTotal = couplingTotal RETURN edgeMetrics } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(edgeMetrics) AS EdgeMetrics

concept.description: Creates a relation HAS_SOURCE_FILE between a Java type and the file from the Git history.
concept.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Java:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type) // determine source file name from class name WITH type, split(type.fileName,"/") as segments WITH type, segments, range(0, size(segments)-2) as indexes WITH type, reduce(path = "", index in indexes | path + segments[index] + "/") + type.sourceFileName as sourceFileName // find file in Git history that ends with the source file name MATCH (file:Git:File) WHERE file.relativePath ends with sourceFileName CALL { WITH type, file MERGE (type)-[:HAS_SOURCE_FILE]->(file) } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(type) as TypesWithSourceFile

concept.description: Provides NumberOfCommits node metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type), (type)-[:HAS_SOURCE_FILE]->(gitFile:Git:File), (commit:Git:Commit)-[:CONTAINS_CHANGE]->(:Git:Change)-[:MODIFIES]->(gitFile) WITH nodeMetrics, count(distinct commit) as numberOfCommits CALL { WITH nodeMetrics, numberOfCommits SET nodeMetrics.numberOfCommits = numberOfCommits } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics

concept.description: Provides NumberOfAuthors node metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Java:Type), (type)-[:HAS_SOURCE_FILE]->(gitFile:Git:File), (author:Git:Author)-[:COMMITTED]->(:Git:Commit)-[:CONTAINS_CHANGE]->(:Git:Change)-[:MODIFIES]->(gitFile) WITH nodeMetrics, count(distinct author) as numberOfAuthors CALL { WITH nodeMetrics, numberOfAuthors SET nodeMetrics.numberOfAuthors = numberOfAuthors } IN TRANSACTIONS RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS NodeMetrics
